column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The bread and butter are to die for. The bread manages to be thick and warm and chewy and delicious all at once
column2: and the butter is the most spreadable I've ever had at a restaurant. Delicious. I ordered the burger
column3: and it was a great burger- the kitchen originally messed up my order so I ended up getting my food after everyone else had finished eating
column4: but at least it was on the house
column5: and very tasty. Everyone else at the table loved what they ordered.
